name: Epic Arcade Project - A Videogame Arcade of Epic Proportions
blurb: To build an arcade in the UK like the ones thriving in Japan. Classic games. New games. Everything in-between. 3 floors. 200+ games.

rewards.reward: [ CERAMIC POT ] \r\nShow your support. We will be most grateful. Most grateful indeed.

[ TREASURE CHEST ]\r\nGet a full days access to the entire arcade on free-play on a specific date chosen by you. That's 200+ arcade machines, pinball, consoles and other goodies, all at your free-playing fingertips. Epic! (e-ticket will be sent once you confirm your attendance date, which you will receive instructions on how to complete in due course).

[ FIREWATER ]\r\nNot one, but two - yes, TWO - 1-day passes (for you and a friend/enemy/other ...) to the entire arcade on free-play on a specific date chosen by you. That's 200+ arcade machines, pinball, consoles and other goodies, all at your free-playing fingertips. Epic! (e-ticket will be sent once you confirm your attendance date, which you will receive instructions on how to complete in due course). Plenty of 2-player action to be had. Co-op with your buddy on some great shooter action, or kick their ass on SF or MK. Perfect!

[ GODDESS' BRACELET ]\r\nNot one, not two - no siree!- not even 3, but FOUR - 1, 2, 3, 4 - 1-day passes (for you and 3 friends/enemies/others ...) to the entire arcade on free-play on a specific date chosen by you. That's 200+ arcade machines, pinball, consoles and other goodies, all at your free-playing fingertips. Epic! (e-ticket will be sent once you confirm your attendance date, which you will receive instructions on how to complete in due course).\r\nPlay some 4-player action on the likes of Turtles or NBA Jam. Sweet!

[ FIREBALL ]\r\nThe [ FIREWATER ] rewards (2 all-day passes), plus entry for 2 people into one of our exclusive onsite gaming competitions. Choose from SF2, SFIV, Tekken, MK3, Killer Instinct, and NBA Jam (more titles may be added subject to demand).

[ PSYCHO CANNON ]\r\nThe [ GODDESS' BRACELET ] rewards plus all 4 ticket-holders names (and 1 URL each, such as personal/twitter/facebook/etc) on our "In it from the Beginning ..." permanent plaque to be featured on one of the entrance walls into our Arcade. This will also be replicated as a permanent fixture on our website once the campaign has ended. Have your details set in stone (literally!) as being a piece of Epic Arcade Project's history and legacy.

[ GATE KEYS ]\r\nIndie developers, this is your lucky day. A 2-day stall at one of our 4 seperate planned Indie developer sessions, where you can tour your goodies to a wide audience in our Arcade. We'll set up space for you, give you access to power, promote the event on our site, let you sell merch on the day commission-free, and set up an area in our Arcade for continued sales and exposure once the event is over. You also get the [ FIREWATER ] reward for you and one other to enjoy, out-with the 2 days you spend onsite for the event (where you will, of course, have full free-play access on those 2 days as well). Full details to follow on our website.

[ NORMAL ARMOUR ]\r\nGet a VIP invite along to our swanky launch night. Hob-nob with the coolest cats of videogaming journalistic society; laugh it off with videogaming celebs of new and old; brainstorm with legendary game designers; and have a jolly good time playing the games too. Oh, and some drinks. And food. And a goody bag. And an all-day pass once the arcade is officially open. And ... well, that's all for now you greedy blighters!

[ MAGIC ARMOUR ]\r\nNot one but two of the above-mentioned [ NORMAL ARMOUR ] rewards. Treat your partner. your best mate. Your worst enemy. Even your gran! You'll both have a blast at this Epic launch night.

[ SUPER MAGIC ARMOUR ]\r\nThe creme-de-la-creme. the Holy Grail. The perfect double perfect! Not only will you get the goodies detailed in the above mentioned [ SUPER ARMOUR ] reward - you will also receive 2 x LIFETIME passes to our arcade. Let me repeat that for the hard of hearing - TWO LIFETIME PASSES TO OUR ARCADE. That also means VIP invites to any and all special events that we have. Top that if you dare :-)
